required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Accuracy of LASIK Flaps Created With the LenSx® Femtosecond Laser - A Pilot Study
clinical_study.official_title: Accuracy of LASIK Flaps Created With the LenSx® Femtosecond Laser - A Pilot Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the thickness accuracy of Laser-assisted in situ keratomileusis (LASIK) flaps created with the LenSx® Laser.

primary_outcome.measure: Flap thickness accuracy within the central zone at Month 3 postoperative
primary_outcome.description: Flap accuracy is defined as mean flap thickness minus desired flap thickness

secondary_outcome.measure: Flap thickness accuracy within the central zone at Month 1 postoperative
secondary_outcome.description: Flap accuracy is defined as mean flap thickness minus desired flap thickness

secondary_outcome.measure: Flap thickness precision within the central zone at Month 1 and Month 3 postoperative
secondary_outcome.description: Flap accuracy precision (variability of the achieved flap thickness) is defined as the standard deviation of the flap thickness measurement

secondary_outcome.measure: Ease of flap dissection at Day 0, operative day
secondary_outcome.description: Ease of flap dissection will be assessed on a scale from 0 to 5 where 0 = Unable to lift flap and 5 = Able to lift flap without any resistance using blunt instrument

secondary_outcome.measure: Stromal bed quality at Day 0, operative day
secondary_outcome.description: Stromal bed quality will be assessed on a scale from 0 to 5 where 0 = Very rough and 5 = Very smooth

secondary_outcome.measure: Opaque Bubble Layer (OBL) at Day 0, operative day
secondary_outcome.description: Opaque bubble layer will be assessed on a scale from 0 to 5 where 0 = No opaque bubble layer and 5 = 100% stromal bed area

secondary_outcome.measure: Uncorrected Distance Visual Acuity (UCDVA) at Month 1 and Month 3 postoperative
secondary_outcome.description: Distance visual acuity will be assessed unaided using a standard Snellen eye chart

secondary_outcome.measure: Best corrected distance visual acuity (BCDVA) Baseline, Month 1 postoperative, and Month 3 postoperative
secondary_outcome.description: Distance visual acuity will be assessed with the participant's best spectacle correction using a standard Snellen eye chart

secondary_outcome.measure: Manifest Refraction at Baseline, Month 1 postoperative, and Month 3 postoperative
secondary_outcome.description: The subject will be manually refracted to his/her best correction using a phoropter and standard Snellen eye charts.

secondary_outcome.measure: Prediction error between target vs achieved refraction at Month 1 and Month 3 postoperative
secondary_outcome.description: Prediction error is defined as target refraction minus achieved refraction

arm_group.description: LASIK surgery in both eyes using LenSx® Femtosecond Laser System

intervention.description: Used for the creation of a corneal flap in patients undergoing LASIK surgery

facility.name: Contact Alcon Call Center for Trial Locations
